programme.title: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: New-York based lawyers Audrey and Daniel, who often compete against each other, get married. However, they find it difficult to learn to draw lines between their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break a family curse, which leads every first marriage to end in a divorce, in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore believe that Dave is going to propose to his girlfriend, Samantha, in Miami. In a bid to retain their place in Dave's life, the three set out to stop him.

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Elizabeth Gilbert's perfect world comes shattering down when she gets divorced. She then embarks on a journey across the world in an attempt to rediscover her true self.

programme.title: Breaking Up
programme.desc: Monica, a schoolteacher, and Steve, a photographer, have been deeply in love for over two years now. However, their impulsive natures often push their fragile relationship into an on-and-off cycle.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Forrest, a man with low IQ, recounts the early years of his life when he found himself in the middle of key historical events. All he wants now is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart, Jenny.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Eight very different couples and their love lives intertwine during a hectic month before Christmas in London.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent, reprises his disguise as a Southern grandmother and works as a nanny to unveil the culprits responsible for designing a deadly computer virus.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a 70-year-old widower, realises that he is not cut out for retirement. He then applies to become a senior intern for a sceptical boss at an online fashion site.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a 70-year-old widower, realises that he is not cut out for retirement. He then applies to become a senior intern for a sceptical boss at an online fashion site.

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: Ambitious about living the life of a cocktail waitress, a lap dancer tries her luck in Las Vegas. However, her life takes an unexpected turn after she falls in love with a sports gambler.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace, who is vacationing in Paris with her friends and stepsister, is mistaken for a British heiress. Later, the three women are whisked away to Monte Carlo, where they discover royalty and romance.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: With the intention of getting a breast implant, Elizabeth becomes a high school substitute teacher. However, when she learns about a bountiful bonus, she strives to get her students the highest marks.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: After FBI agent Malcolm Turner's stepson, Trent, witnesses a murder, the two are forced to go undercover. While Malcolm turns into Big Momma, Trent disguises himself as Charmaine.

programme.title: Guess Who
programme.desc: Percy Jones, a proud African American man, gets the shock of his life when he learns that his daughter Theresa's fiance is a Caucasian man.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: When Gargamel learns that Smurfette knows a secret spell that can turn Naughties, Smurf-like creatures, into real Smurfs, he kidnaps her. The Smurfs set out to rescue Smurfette.

programme.title: Carpool
programme.desc: Daniel Miller has to take care of the carpool for his sons and the neighbourhood school children when his wife falls sick. However, in the course of the day, he finds himself a victim of a robbery.

programme.title: Due Date
programme.desc: Peter Highman must reach Los Angeles to make it in time for his child's birth. However, he is forced to travel with Ethan, an aspiring actor, who frequently lands him in trouble.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: With her career crashing and her boyfriend dumping her, Ally tries to contact her former partners in the desperate hope of finding true love.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: To find her independence outside the White House, Samantha Mackenzie, daughter of the US President, leaves for college and falls in love with a student who is hiding a secret.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: Things get interesting when Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent and a disguise master, assumes the role of an elderly lady to nab an escaped convict.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: Things get interesting when Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent and a disguise master, assumes the role of an elderly lady to nab an escaped convict.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: A brother and sister return to their family home in search of their world famous parents who have disappeared.

programme.title: Man on fire
programme.desc: Jaded ex-CIA operative John Creasy reluctantly accepts a job as the bodyguard for a 10-year-old girl in Mexico City. They clash at first, but eventually bond, and when she's kidnapped he's consumed by fury and will stop at nothing to save her life.

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Maria Altmann, an octogenarian Jewish refugee, takes on the Austrian government to recover a world famous painting of her aunt plundered by the Nazis during World War II, she believes rightfully belongs to her family. She did so not just to regain what was rightfully hers, but also to obtain some measure of justice for the death, destruction, and massive art theft perpetrated by the Nazis.

programme.title: Boychoir
programme.desc: A troubled and angry 11-year-old orphan from a small Texas town, ends up at a Boy Choir school after the death of his single mother. Completely out of his element, he finds himself in a battle of wills with a demanding Choir Master who recognises a unique talent in this young boy as he pushes him to discover his creative heart and soul in music.

programme.title: Serena
programme.desc: North Carolina mountains at the end of the 1920s George and Serena Pemberton, love-struck newly-weds, begin to build a timber empire. Serena soon proves herself to be equal to any man: overseeing loggers, hunting rattle-snakes, even saving a mans life in the wilderness. With power and influence now in their hands, the Pembertons refuse to let anyone stand in the way of their inflated love and ambitions. However, once Serena discovers Georges hidden past and faces an unchangeable fate of her.

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: It's 1863. America was born in the streets. Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points of America to seek vengeance against the psychotic gangland kingpin, Bill the Butcher, who murdered his father years earlier. With an eager pickpocket by his side and a whole new army, Vallon fights his way to seek vengeance on the Butcher and restore peace in the area.

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: A woman turns to prescription medication as a way of handling her anxiety concerning her husband's upcoming release from prison.

programme.title: Belle and Sebastian
programme.desc: Belle and Sebastian is set high in the snowy Alps during the Second World War. The resourceful Sebastian is a lonely boy who tames and befriends a giant, wild mountain dog, Belle even though the villagers believe her to be the beast that has been killing their sheep.

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fianc's right-wing moralistic parents.

programme.title: August: Osage County
